pullrequest.title: Fix seeking back in time in log playback

content.raw: hmm I just tested this but couldn’t reproduce the problem. Here’s my [state.tlog](https://www.dropbox.com/s/yi7z2bbd7xr2ggy/state.tlog?dl=0). I launched gazebo and played for ~10s until the double pendulum disappears, and seek to 1s - the model popped back. I also tried rewind, play till 10s, then seek to 7s but the outcome is still correct. Am I missing a step?

I launched gazebo and played for ~10s until the double pendulum disappears, and seek to 1s - the model popped back.
